description:
Untrusted AI doesn’t make it into production. The concerns are just too
high. In this talk we’ll show how data lineage, bias detection,
adversarial robustness and model explainability can be achieved using an
open source stack

Untrusted AI doesn’t make it into production. The concerns are just too
high. In this talk we’ll show how data lineage, bias detection,
adversarial robustness and model explainability can be achieved using an
open source stack
title: Keynote: Trusted AI – Building Reproducible, Unbiased and Robust AI Pipelines using the python OpenSource sta
